Umineko Project (UP): "Anyway, he is a fickle person, so it's possible that he went for a walk by himself without knowing the current situation. ......If that is the case, we have to tell him what has happened and ask for instructions as fast as we can."
Steam (ST): Anyway, he is a fickle person, so it's possible he went for a walk by himself, unaware of the current situation. ......If that is the case, then we must act in all haste to tell him what has happened and ask for instructions."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Anyway, he is a fickle person, so it's possible that he went for a walk by himself without knowing the current situation. ......If that is the case, we have to tell him what has happened and ask for instructions as fast as we can."
PC Japanese (JP): とにかく気まぐれな方ですから、現状をご存知なく、おひとりで散歩をされている可能性もあります。……仮にそうだとしたら、一刻も早く、現状をお知らせして、ご指示を仰がねばなりません。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「とにかく気まぐれな方ですから、現状をご存知なく、おひとりで散歩をされている可能性もあります。……仮にそうだとしたら、一刻も早く、現状をお知らせして、ご指示を仰がねばなりません」
Russian (RU): "В любом случае он непостоянный человек, поэтому вполне возможно, что он вышел на прогулку, не зная о сложившейся ситуации. ......Если это так, мы должны рассказать ему о случившемся и как можно быстрее запросить дальнейшие инструкции."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "De qualquer forma, ele é uma pessoa caprichosa, então é possível ele ter saído sozinho para uma caminhada, sem saber da situação atual. ......Se esse é o caso, nós temos que dizer pra ele o que aconteceu e pedir por instruções o mais rápido possível."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「總之爸是個隨心所欲的人，有可能他不知道現在的情況，一個人出去散步了。……假如真是這樣，那必須盡快告訴爸現在的情況，請爸主持大局。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「总之爸是个随心所欲的人，有可能他不知道现在的情况，一个人出去散步了。……假如真是这样，那必须尽快告诉爸现在的情况，请爸主持大局。」
Italian (IT): "Ad ogni modo, è un uomo volubile, quindi è possibile che sia uscito da solo a passeggiare, ignaro della situazione attuale... Se così fosse, dobbiamo immediatamente informarlo della situazione, e chiedergli il corso d'azioni da intraprendere."
Turkish (TR): "Her neyse, o anlaşılması zor bir insan, bu yüzden mevcut durumu bile bilmeden kendi başına yürüyüşe çıkmış olması mümkün. ......Eğer durum buysa, ona neler olduğunu anlatmalı ve olabildiğince hızlı bir şekilde gerekli talimatları almalıyız."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's right. .........Although I don't want to think about it, ...it's possible that something has happened to him, isn't it...?"
Steam (ST): "...That's right. ......Although I don't want to think about it, ...it's possible something has happened to him, isn't it...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうねぇ。………考えたくはないけど、…お父様の身に何かあったのかもしれないしねぇ…？」
Russian (RU): "......Согласна. .........Хотя мне и думать об этом не хочется... но, возможно, что с ним что‐нибудь могло случиться, разве не так?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso mesmo. .........Embora eu não queira pensar sobre isso, ...é possível que alguma coisa tenha acontecido com ele, não é...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是呀。………雖然是不願這麼想，…但爸說不定真出了什麼事呢，對吧…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是呀。………虽然是不愿这么想，…但爸说不定真出了什么事呢，对吧…？」
Italian (IT): "...Giusto... Non voglio pensarci, ma... e se fosse successo qualcosa a nostro padre...?"
Turkish (TR): "......Bu doğru. .........Her ne kadar bunu düşünmek istemesem de, ...başına bir şey gelmiş olması mümkün, değil mi...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): "I don't even want to think about something that ominous...!"
Steam (ST): "I'd rather not even consider such a sinister possibility...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そのような不吉なことは考えたくもありません…！」
Russian (RU): "Я не желаю даже думать о чём‐то зловещем!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu nem quero pensar em algo tão sinistro...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這種不吉利的事我甚至連想都不願去想…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这种不吉利的事我甚至连想都不愿去想…！」
Italian (IT): "Non voglio nemmeno pensare ad un'eventualità tanto nefasta...!"
Turkish (TR): "Bu kadar ürkütücü bir şeyi düşünmek bile istemiyorum...!"

Umineko Project (UP): No one had seen Kinzo since the six horrible corpses had been found.{n}On top of that, the phones were broken, the radio wouldn't reach anyone, and there was no way to contact the police.
Steam (ST): No one had seen Kinzo since the discovery of those six terrible corpses. On top of that, the phones were broken, the radio wouldn't reach anyone, and there was no way to contact the police.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No one had seen Kinzo since the six horrible corpses had been found. On top of that, the phones were broken, the radio wouldn't reach anyone, and there was no way to contact the police.
PC Japanese (JP): ６人が無惨な死体で発見され、金蔵の姿が見えない。その上、電話は故障し、無線も通じず、警察にも連絡が取れない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ６人が無惨な死体で発見され、金蔵の姿が見えない。{n}その上、電話は故障し、無線も通じず、警察にも連絡が取れない。
Russian (RU): Никто не видел Кинзо после того, как были обнаружены шесть трупов.{n}Вдобавок телефоны были сломаны, радиосигналы ни до кого не доходили, и не было никакого способа связаться с полицией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ninguém tinha visto Kinzo desde que os seis cadáveres tinham sido encontrados.{n}Além disso, os telefones estavam quebrados, o rádio não chegaria a ninguém, e não há nenhuma maneira de entrar em contato com a polícia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 發現了六人淒慘的屍體，金藏又不見踪影。{n}再加上，電話出故障，無線電不通，警察也聯絡不上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 发现了六人凄惨的尸体，金藏又不见踪影。{n}再加上，电话出故障，无线电不通，警察也联络不上。
Italian (IT): Da quando avevano rinvenuto quei sei orrendi cadaveri, nessuno aveva visto Kinzo. Inoltre, coi telefoni guasti e la radio non funzionante, non c'era modo di contattare la polizia...
Turkish (TR): Kinzo'yu altı korkunç ceset bulunduğundan beri kimse görmemişti.{n}Bunun da ötesinde, telefonlar bozuktu, telsiz de kimseye ulaşmıyordu ve polise ulaşmanın hiçbir yolu yoktu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...It looked like the typhoon would leave tomorrow and a boat would come, ......but until then, no one could rely on anyone outside the island, nor could they escape the island.
Steam (ST): ...Apparently, the typhoon would leave tomorrow and a boat would come, ...but until then, no one could rely on anyone outside the island, nor could they escape the island.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...It looked like the typhoon would leave tomorrow and a boat would come, ......until then, no one could rely on anyone outside the island, nor could they escape the island.
PC Japanese (JP): …台風も明日には去り、船も来てくれるらしいが、……それまでこの島は、外部の誰にも頼れず、そして誰も逃げ出すことができないということだ。
Russian (RU): ...Казалось, что ураган уйдёт завтра, и вместе с тем прибудет катер......... а пока что люди на этом острове не могли ни на кого положиться за его пределами, ни сбежать с него.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Parece que o tufão desapareceria amanhã e um barco viria, ......mas até então, ninguém podia confiar em alguém de fora da ilha, nem eles poderiam escapar da ilha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖然台風似乎明天就會過去，船也會來，……但在那之前，大家在這座島上是孤立無援，誰都逃不出去的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽然台风似乎明天就会过去，船也会来，……但在那之前，大家在这座岛上是孤立无援，谁都逃不出去的。
Italian (IT): Apparentemente, domani il tifone avrebbe cessato di soffiare, e sarebbe arrivato il battello... ma fino ad allora, nessuno poteva fare affidamento su qualcuno al di fuori dell'isola, né potevano fuggire via da essa.
Turkish (TR): ...Görünüşe göre tayfun yarın gidecek ve bir tekne gelecekti, ......ancak o zamana kadar kimse ne ada dışından birine ulaşabilir ne de adadan kaçabilirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): Everyone had lost their composure at the extremely sudden tragedy.
Steam (ST): The tragedy had hit everyone so abruptly that they'd lost all their composure.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Everyone had lost their composure at the extremely sudden tragedy.
PC Japanese (JP): 誰もがあまりに突然の惨劇に、冷静さを失っていた。
Russian (RU): Неожиданно произошедшая трагедия заставила всех потерять спокойствие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos haviam perdido a compostura por conta da tragédia súbita e extrema.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所有人都因突如其來的慘劇，喪失了冷靜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所有人都因突如其来的惨剧，丧失了冷静。
Italian (IT): Dinanzi ad una tragedia così improvvisa, tutti avevano perso il loro contegno...
Turkish (TR): Bu son derece ani trajedi karşısında herkes soğukkanlılığını kaybetmişti.

Umineko Project (UP): ...A heavy silence and a sense of impatience.{n}...Even though they needed to do something, they couldn't think of anything; some of them became irritated, while others merely held their heads in their hands.
Steam (ST): ...Everyone felt a heavy silence. Everyone was impatient. ...Even though they needed to do something, they couldn't think of anything, so some of them held their heads in their arms while others got irritated.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Everyone felt a heavy silence. Everyone was impatient....Even though they needed to do something, they couldn't think of anything, so some of them held their heads in their arms while others got irritated.
PC Japanese (JP): …重苦しい沈黙と焦燥感。…何かをしなくてはならないのに、何も思いつかず、ある者はイラつき、ある者は頭を抱えるだけ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …重苦しい沈黙と焦燥感。{n}…何かをしなくてはならないのに、何も思いつかず、ある者はイラつき、ある者は頭を抱えるだけ。
Russian (RU): ...Каждый ощущал гнетущую тишину. Все были на пределе.{n}...Даже несмотря на то, что им следовало что‐нибудь сделать, они не могли ни о чём подумать; одни сидели, схватившись руками за голову, а другие предавались раздражению.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Um pesado silêncio e uma sensação de impaciência.{n}...Mesmo que fosse necessário fazer alguma coisa, não era possível se pensar em nada; alguns deles ficaram irritados, enquanto os outros mantiveram suas cabeças apoiadas pelas mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …只剩下令人胸悶的沉默和焦躁感。{n}…明明必須去做點什麼，卻什麼也想不出來，有的人顯得煩躁不安，有的人則只是抱著頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …只剩下令人胸闷的沉默和焦躁感。{n}…明明必须去做点什么，却什么也想不出来，有的人显得烦躁不安，有的人则只是抱着头。
Italian (IT): C'era un silenzio tombale, e un senso di inquietudine... Anche se sentivano il bisogno di fare qualcosa, alcuni erano irrequieti, e altri non sapevano a quale dio votarsi, ma entrambi non riuscirono ad escogitare nulla...
Turkish (TR): ...Ağır bir sessizlik ve sabırsızlık duygusu.{n}...Bir şeyler yapmaları gerektiği halde akıllarına hiçbir şey gelmiyordu; bazıları irite olurken, bazıları da sadece başlarını iki elinin arasına koymakla yetindi.

Umineko Project (UP): .........But not one of them...could explain what was occurring on this island of Rokkenjima......
Steam (ST): .........Right now, no one could explain what was occurring on this island, Rokkenjima...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........Right now, no one could explain what was occurring on this island, Rokkenjima......
PC Japanese (JP): ………誰にも、…今、この六軒島で何が起こっているのか説明することはできなかった……。
Russian (RU): .........Никто из них... в этот момент не мог объяснить, что же творилось на Роккенджиме......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Mas nenhum deles...sabia explicar o que estava acontecendo em Rokkenjima......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………無論是誰，…都無法說清此刻在這六軒島上到底發生了什麼……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………无论是谁，…都无法说清此刻在这六轩岛上到底发生了什么……。
Italian (IT): Ora come ora... nessuno poteva spiegare cosa stesse succedendo sull'isola di Rokkenjima...
Turkish (TR): .........Ama hiçbiri...Rokkenjima adasında neler olduğunu açıklayamadı......

Umineko Project (UP): After that, we sat in the parlor and wordlessly chewed through the breakfast that Kumasawa‐san had made.
Steam (ST): After that, we ate the breakfast Kumasawa-san had made, which felt dry and tasteless.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After that, we ate the breakfast that Kumasawa-san had made. It felt dry and tasteless.
PC Japanese (JP): その後、熊沢さんが作ってくれた朝食を、客間でぼそぼそと食べた。
Russian (RU): После этого мы съели завтрак, приготовленный Кумасавой‐сан. Он казался сухим и безвкусным.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, sentamos na sala de visitas e, sem nenhuma palavra, degustamos o café da manhã que a Kumasawa‐san tinha preparado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 之後，我們在客廳吃了熊澤做的早餐，味如嚼蠟。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 之后，我们在客厅吃了熊泽做的早餐，味如嚼蜡。
Italian (IT): In seguito, mangiammo nel salotto la colazione allestita da Kumasawa-san, che ci parve asciutta ed insapore.
Turkish (TR): Daha sonra salonda oturduk ve Kumasawa-san'ın hazırladığı kahvaltıyı sessiz bir şekilde yedik.

Umineko Project (UP): Of course, this was right after something like that had happened.{n}No one had any appetite.
Steam (ST): Of course, this was right after something like that had happened. No one felt particularly hungry.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, this was right after something like that had happened. No one felt particularly hungry.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん、あんなことがあった直後だ。誰だって食欲などわかない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): もちろん、あんなことがあった直後だ。{n}誰だって食欲などわかない。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, после всего случившегося, этого и следовало ожидать.{n}Никто особо и не проголодался.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, isso foi logo depois de algo como aquilo ter acontecido.{n}Ninguém tinha qualquer apetite.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是當然，畢竟剛剛發生過那種事。{n}無論是誰都不會有食欲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是当然，毕竟刚刚发生过那种事。{n}无论是谁都不会有食欲。
Italian (IT): Era naturale, dopo tutto quello che era successo. Nessuno si sentiva particolarmente affamato...
Turkish (TR): Tabii ki bu, böyle bir şey olduktan hemen sonrasıydı.{n}Kimsenin iştahı yoktu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...However, we realized that not eating would weaken our bodies. ...It would also be rude to Kumasawa‐san, who had made the breakfast.
Steam (ST): However, we understood logically that not eating would weaken our bodies. ...It would also be rude to Kumasawa-san, who had made the breakfast.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, we realized that not eating would weaken our bodies. It would also be rude to Kumasawa-san, who had made the breakfast.
PC Japanese (JP): …でも、食べなければ体が参ってしまうのは理屈でわかっている。…それに作ってくれた熊沢さんにも悪い。
Russian (RU): Однако мы понимали, что без еды наши тела ослабеют от голода. ...Тем более это было бы грубо в отношении Кумасавы‐сан, приготовившей завтрак.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Contudo, percebemos que não comer poderia enfraquecer nossos corpos. ...Além disso, seria rude com a Kumasawa‐san, que tinha preparado o café da manhã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …但我們都知道，不吃飯的話身體是撐不住的。…而且這樣對做了早餐的熊澤也不禮貌。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …但我们都知道，不吃饭的话身体是撑不住的。…而且这样对做了早餐的熊泽也不礼貌。
Italian (IT): Ma eravamo consci che ci saremmo indeboliti, se non avessimo mangiato...{n}E sarebbe stato scortese nei confronti di Kumasawa-san, che l'aveva preparata per noi.
Turkish (TR): ...Ancak, aç kalmanın vücudumuzu zayıflatacağını fark ettik. ...Ayrıca kahvaltıyı hazırlayan Kumasawa-san'a karşı da kabalık olurdu.

Umineko Project (UP): Kumasawa‐san had taken the tasteful western vegetables, ones that Gohda‐san had probably special ordered for the purpose of some extravagantly fancy dish, and cooked them in a Japanese style, making them turn an unpleasant color.
Steam (ST): Kumasawa-san had taken some unusual Western vegetables, ones that Gohda-san had probably ordered for his ultra-elaborate meals, and cooked them in a Japanese style, which made them turn an unpleasant color.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kumasawa-san had taken the tasteful western vegetables, ones that Gohda-san had probably ordered to make the meals feel more elaborate, and cooked them in a Japanese style, making them turn an unpleasant color.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんが、凝りに凝った料理のために取り寄せただろう珍しい西洋野菜は、熊沢さんによって、和風に料理され、違和感のある彩りとなっていた。
Russian (RU): Кумасава‐сан, вероятно, взяла сочные западные овощи, которые, судя по всему, заказал Года‐сан для приготовления изысканных блюд, и приготовила их в японском стиле, из‐за чего они приобрели не совсем приятный оттенок.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Kumasawa‐san tinha usado os legumes ocidentais saborosos, aqueles que o Gohda‐san provavelmente tinha encomendado com o propósito de algum prato extravagante e elegante, e os cozinhou ao estilo japonês, deixando‐os com uma cor desagradável.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田為了他那豪華講究的料理而訂購來的珍稀西洋蔬菜，被熊澤做成了和風料理，成了一桌不倫不類的色彩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田为了他那豪华讲究的料理而订购来的珍稀西洋蔬菜，被熊泽做成了和风料理，成了一桌不伦不类的色彩。
Italian (IT): Kumasawa-san aveva cucinato delle strane verdure occidentali, che probabilmente Gouda-san aveva ordinato per dei piatti più elaborati, in stile giapponese, cosa che le fece diventare di un colore sgradevole.
Turkish (TR): Kumasawa-san, Gohda-san'ın muhtemelen abartılı bir yemek için özel olarak sipariş ettiği lezzetli batı sebzelerini almış, ve onları Japon usulü pişirerek hoş olmayan bir renge bürünmelerini sağlamıştı.

Umineko Project (UP): As to what Gohda‐san had been planning to cook with those ingredients...right then I couldn't even imagine it.
Steam (ST): As to what Gohda-san had been planning to cook with those ingredients, ...right then I couldn't even imagine it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As to what Gohda-san had been planning to cook with those ingredients... right then I couldn't even imagine it.
PC Japanese (JP): これらの材料によって、郷田さんがどんな料理を作るつもりだったのか…。今となっては想像することもできない。
Russian (RU): Что Года‐сан собирался готовить из всех этих ингредиентов... я даже представить себе этого не мог.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quanto ao que o Gohda‐san tinha planejado cozinhar com esses ingredientes...eu não podia nem sequer imaginar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田到底想用這些材料，做些什麼料理呢…？現如今是想都沒法想了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田到底想用这些材料，做些什么料理呢…？现如今是想都没法想了。
Italian (IT): In quel momento, non riuscivo ad immaginare... che cosa Gouda-san avesse intenzione di cucinare con quegli ingredienti.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san'ın o malzemelerle o anda ne pişirmeyi planladığını...düşünemiyorum bile.

Umineko Project (UP): If I did think about it, I would be reminded of the way Gohda‐san had died, and the inside of my mouth would be filled with a sour taste...
Steam (ST): If I did think about it, I'd be reminded of the way Gohda-san died, and a sour taste would fill the inside of my mouth...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I did think about it, I would be reminded of the way Gohda-san had died, and the inside of my mouth would be filled with a sour taste...
PC Japanese (JP): それを想像すれば、郷田さんの死に様が再び蘇り、口の中が酸っぱい何かで満たされる…。
Russian (RU): Если я буду думать об этом, то вспомню, как умер Года‐сан, и у меня во рту станет слишком кисло...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu pensasse nisso, poderia me lembrar da maneira como Gohda‐san havia morrido, e o interior da minha boca seria preenchido com um gosto azedo...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為一想這個，腦中就會重新浮現起鄉田的死相，口中溢出某種酸楚的滋味…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为一想这个，脑中就会重新浮现起乡田的死相，口中溢出某种酸楚的滋味…。
Italian (IT): Se ci avessi pensato, mi sarebbe tornato in mente il modo in cui Gouda-san era morto, e mi sarei sentito dell'acido in tutta la bocca...
Turkish (TR): Eğer bunu düşünecek olsaydım, Gohda-san'ın ölüm şeklini hatırlardım ve ağzımın içi ekşi bir tatla dolardı...

Umineko Project (UP): For the time being, everyone pretended to eat, but there was no hope of anyone making any headway into the meal.
Steam (ST): Everyone pretended to eat for the time being, but of course, no one made much progress.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For the time being, everyone pretended to eat, but no one was actually going to move their chopsticks.
PC Japanese (JP): みんなは一応、食べるふりだけするのだが、箸が進むはずもなかった。
Russian (RU): Некоторое время все сделали вид, что едят, но никто на самом деле даже не притронулся к пище.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por enquanto, todos fingiam estar comendo, mas não havia esperança de ninguém continuar comendo a refeição.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然大家姑且是裝出了在吃的樣子，但是根本不可能下得去筷子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然大家姑且是装出了在吃的样子，但是根本不可能下得去筷子。
Italian (IT): Tutti praticamente fecero finta di mangiare, ma nessuno trovò il piatto delizioso.
Turkish (TR): Şimdilik herkes yemek yiyormuş gibi yapıyordu ama kimsenin yemekte ilerleme kaydetme umudu yoktu.

Umineko Project (UP): Then, everyone was brought up to speed on the current situation.
Steam (ST): Then, we began pooling our knowledge of our current situation.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then everyone began thinking about the current situation.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、現状についての周知が行われた。
Russian (RU): Затем все принялись размышлять о текущей ситуации.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, todos foram atualizados sobre a situação atual.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，我們就現在的情況做了個情報共享。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，我们就现在的情况做了个情报共享。
Italian (IT): Dopodiché, feci il punto della situazione attuale.
Turkish (TR): Sonra herkes mevcut durum hakkında bilgilendirildi.

Umineko Project (UP): First off, ......that Uncle Krauss, my dad, Kyrie‐san, Auntie Rosa, Gohda‐san and Shannon‐chan...had been found in the rose garden storehouse as cruelly mutilated corpses.
Steam (ST): First off, ...six people, which included Uncle Krauss, my dad, Kyrie-san, Aunt Rosa, Gohda-san and Shannon-chan... had been found in the rose garden storehouse as brutally mutilated corpses.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): First off, ......Krauss oji-san, my dad, Kyrie-san, Rosa oba-san, Gohda-san and Shannon-chan: six people whose cruelly mutilated corpses had been found in the rose garden storehouse.
PC Japanese (JP): まず、……蔵臼伯父さん、ウチの親父、霧江さん、楼座叔母さん、郷田さんに紗音ちゃんの６人が、薔薇庭園の倉庫で無惨な死体となって発見されたこと。
Russian (RU): Для начала...... дядя Краусс, мой папа, Кирие‐сан, тётя Роза, Года‐сан и Шаннон‐чан... были найдены в виде жестоко изуродованных трупов в кладовой в розарии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Primeiramente, ......que o tio Krauss, meu pai, a Kyrie‐san, a tia Rosa, o Gohda‐san e a Shannon‐chan...haviam sido encontrados no depósito perto do jardim das rosas, com os corpos cruelmente mutilados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 首先，……我們在玫瑰庭園的倉庫裡，發現了藏臼伯父、我的老爸、霧江姐、樓座姑母、鄉田、紗音，這六人淒慘的屍體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 首先，……我们在玫瑰庭园的仓库里，发现了藏臼伯父、我的老爸、雾江姐、楼座姑母、乡田、纱音，这六人凄惨的尸体。
Italian (IT): Prima di tutto... Zio Klaus, il mio vecchio, Kirie-san, zia Rosa, Gouda-san e Shannon-chan... I cadaveri sfregiati di queste sei persone erano stati ritrovati nel magazzino del roseto.
Turkish (TR): İlk olarak, ......Krauss Amca, babam, Kyrie-san, Rosa Teyze, Gohda-san ve Shannon-chan...gül bahçesi ambarında acımasızca parçalanmış cesetler olarak bulunmuştu.

Umineko Project (UP): And that despite that, we were unable to use phones or radio, and still couldn't contact the police.
Steam (ST): And yet, we still couldn't contact the police, since both the phones and the radio were unusable.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And despite that, without being able to use phones or radio, we still couldn't contact the police.
PC Japanese (JP): にもかかわらず、電話も無線も使えず、警察への連絡が未だできないこと。
Russian (RU): И помимо этого, не имея возможности воспользоваться телефоном или радио, мы до сих пор не могли связаться с полицией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E que apesar disso, não conseguimos usar os telefones ou o rádio, e ainda não conseguimos entrar em contato com a polícia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但電話和無線電都用不了，至今無法聯繫警察。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但电话和无线电都用不了，至今无法联系警察。
Italian (IT): Ciononostante, coi telefoni e la radio fuori uso, non c'era modo di contattare la polizia...
Turkish (TR): Ve buna rağmen telefon ya da telsiz kullanamıyor ve hala polise ulaşamıyorduk.

Umineko Project (UP): ......So until the typhoon passed, there was nothing we could do.
Steam (ST): ...So, until the typhoon passed, there was nothing we could do.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……つまり、ってことはこの台風が通り過ぎるまで、俺たちにできることは何もないってわけだ。
Russian (RU): ......Поэтому, пока не пройдёт ураган, мы были повязаны по рукам и ногам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Então, até o tufão passar, não havia nada que nós pudéssemos fazer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……也就是說，在台風過去前，我們什麼都做不了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……也就是说，在台风过去前，我们什么都做不了。
Italian (IT): In altre parole, finché non sarebbe cessato il tifone, non c'era niente che potessimo fare.
Turkish (TR): ......Yani tayfun geçene kadar yapabileceğimiz hiçbir şey yoktu.

Umineko Project (UP): Furthermore, Grandfather, who we had hoped might be able to show a little leadership in this kind of a situation, had disappeared at some point.
Steam (ST): Furthermore, Grandfather, who we might've hoped would be able to show a little leadership in this kind of a situation, had disappeared some time ago.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Furthermore, Grandfather, who we had hoped might be able to show a little leadership in this kind of a situation, had disappeared some time ago.
PC Japanese (JP): さらに、この事態に少しはリーダーシップを発揮してくれるかと期待した祖父さまはいつの間にかいなくなっていた。
Russian (RU): Кроме того, дедушка, который, как мы надеялись, мог бы проявить свои лидерские качества в такой ситуации, исчез некоторое время назад.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além disso, o vovô, que esperávamos ser capaz de mostrar um pouco de liderança neste tipo de situação, tinha desaparecido em algum momento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此外，被期待著能在這情況下多多少少主持下大局的爺爺，不知道在何時不見了踪影。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此外，被期待着能在这情况下多多少少主持下大局的爷爷，不知道在何时不见了踪影。
Italian (IT): Inoltre il nonno, in cui speravamo che in circostanze del genere avrebbe mostrato un po' di leadership, era scomparso all'insaputa di tutti...
Turkish (TR): Dahası, bu tür bir durumda biraz olsun önderlik gösterebileceğini umduğumuz Büyükbaba da bir noktada ortadan kaybolmuştu.

Umineko Project (UP): ......Gohda‐san hadn't made breakfast, so Grandfather's stomach must have been empty, and if he had just been taking a casual walk, by now he should have been stomping back to whine about how hungry he was.
Steam (ST): ......Gohda-san hadn't made breakfast, so Grandfather's stomach must have been empty, and if he had just been taking a casual walk, we should've been able to hear him whining about how hungry he was by now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Gohda-san hadn't made breakfast, so Grandfather's stomach must have been empty, and if he had just been taking a casual walk, we should have been able to hear him whining about how hungry he was about now.
PC Japanese (JP): ……郷田さんが朝食を作らなかったのだから、未だ空腹なはずで、単にぶらりと散歩に出ているだけなら、今頃空腹で向こうからぴーぴー言ってくるはずだ。
Russian (RU): ......Года‐сан не приготовил завтрак, поэтому в животе у дедушки должно быть пусто, и если бы он уже возвращался после прогулки, то мы бы услышали его недовольные причитания о том, как он проголодался.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O Gohda‐san não tinha feito o café da manhã, então o estômago do vovô deve ter ficado vazio, e se ele tivesse apenas saído para uma caminhada casual, já deveria ter voltado para reclamar do quão faminto ele estava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……因為鄉田沒做早飯，所以爺爺應該還餓著肚子，若他僅僅是在漫無目的地散步的話，那現在也是時候肚子咕咕叫著朝我們抱怨了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……因为乡田没做早饭，所以爷爷应该还饿着肚子，若他仅仅是在漫无目的地散步的话，那现在也是时候肚子咕咕叫着朝我们抱怨了。
Italian (IT): Gouda-san non aveva preparato la colazione, per cui doveva ancora avere lo stomaco vuoto, e se stava solamente facendo una passeggiata, sarebbe venuto a lamentarsi di quanto fosse affamato.
Turkish (TR): ......Gohda-san kahvaltı hazırlamadığı için Büyükbabanın midesi boş olmalıydı ve eğer öylesine bir yürüyüşe çıkmış olsaydı, şimdiye kadar ne kadar aç olduğu konusunda sızlanarak geri dönmüş olması gerekirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): And yet, he hadn't appeared.
Steam (ST): And despite that, he hadn't appeared.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And despite that, he hadn't appeared.
PC Japanese (JP): にもかかわらず、現れない。
Russian (RU): Однако, несмотря на это, он не появлялся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo assim, ele ainda não tinha aparecido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，他卻沒有現身。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，他却没有现身。
Italian (IT): Eppure, non si era fatto vivo...
Turkish (TR): Ama yine de, ortaya çıkmamıştı.

Umineko Project (UP): ......There was more than a small chance that he had become caught up in the earlier crime.
Steam (ST): ......There was more than a small chance that he'd gotten caught up in this crime.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……事件に巻き込まれた可能性は少なくなかった。
Russian (RU): ......Имелась и немаленькая вероятность, что он стал жертвой того преступления.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Havia mais do que uma pequena chance de ele ter sido pego pelo crime anterior.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……卷入事件的可能性並不小。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……卷入事件的可能性并不小。
Italian (IT): Le probabilità che fosse stato coinvolto nel delitto non erano esigue.
Turkish (TR): ......Daha önce işlenen suça karışmış olma ihtimali çok azdı.

Umineko Project (UP): Aunt Natsuhi and Auntie Eva had said that, on their return trip from going to see Kinzo, they had called out to him on every floor, looking for him, but were not able to find him.
Steam (ST): According to my aunts, on their way back from Kinzo's study, they'd searched for him, calling out on every floor, but were unable to find him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi oba-san and Eva oba-san had said that, on their return trip from going to see Kinzo, they had called out to him on every floor, looking for him, but were not able to find him.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃伯母さんたちは、祖父さまを呼びに行った帰りに、その姿を探して各階に声を掛けたそうだが見つけられなかったという。
Russian (RU): Тётя Нацухи и тётя Ева сказали, что на обратном пути из кабинета Кинзо они звали и искали его на всех этажах, но безрезультатно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Natsuhi e a tia Eva tinham dito disso. Na volta quando foram ver Kinzo, elas tinham chamado por ele em cada andar, procurando‐o. Porém, não conseguiram encontrá‐lo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 據說夏妃伯母他們為了找爺爺，在回來的途中每層樓都有喊過他，但還是沒有找到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 据说夏妃伯母他们为了找爷爷，在回来的途中每层楼都有喊过他，但还是没有找到。
Italian (IT): Stando alle mie zie, sulla via del ritorno dalla stanza del nonno, lo avevano cercato e lo avevano chiamato in ogni piano, ma non erano state capaci di trovarlo...
Turkish (TR): Natsuhi Teyze ve Eva Teyze, Kinzo'yu görmeye gittikten sonra dönüş yolunda her katta ona seslendiklerini ve aradıklarını ama bulamadıklarını söylemişlerdi.

Umineko Project (UP): ...If you think about the timing of it all, it was probably best to think that he had been caught up in the crime.
Steam (ST): ...Considering the timing of it all, it's only reasonable to assume that this disappearance had something to do with the crime.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …タイミング的に考えて、事件に関係があると考えるのが妥当だろう。
Russian (RU): ...Если принять во внимание временные промежутки случившегося, то весьма вероятно, что он стал жертвой преступления.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Se você pensar sobre o timing de tudo isso, provavelmente era melhor pensar que ele havia sido pego no crime.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …從時機上來看，還是應該認為此事與事件有關吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …从时机上来看，还是应该认为此事与事件有关吧。
Italian (IT): Se si pensa alla tempistica degli eventi, era ragionevole presumere che fossero connessi con il crimine.
Turkish (TR): ...Tüm bunların zamanlamasını düşünürseniz, muhtemelen en mantıklısı onun suça karışmış olduğunu düşünmekti.

Umineko Project (UP): If the culprit had taken the trouble to move the bodies of Dad and the rest, who we figured had been killed in the dining hall, all the way to the storehouse, then maybe they had already killed Grandfather, moved his body to some strange location, and we had simply not found it yet... No one actually said it, but this theory seemed extremely convincing...
Steam (ST): We figured Dad and the rest were probably killed in the dining hall and then painstakingly moved to the storehouse. So maybe, Grandfather has already been killed... and dragged to some strange place, which we simply haven't discovered yet... No one actually said it out loud, but this theory seemed extremely convincing...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If the culprit had taken the trouble to move the corpses of Dad and the rest, who we figured had been killed in the dining hall, all the way to the storehouse, maybe they had already killed Grandfather, moved his corpse to some strange location, and we had simply not found it yet. No one actually said it, but this theory seemed extremely convincing...
PC Japanese (JP): 食堂で殺されたと思われるうちの親父たちが、わざわざその遺体を倉庫に移されていたように、祖父さまもすでに殺されていて、その遺体が妙な場所に運び込まれていて、未だ発見されていないだけ…、というのは誰も口にしないが、非常に説得力のある想像だった…。
Russian (RU): Если преступник не поленился перетащить в кладовую трупы папы и остальных, убитых, как мы предположили, в столовой, то возможно, что он убил и дедушку, перетащил его труп в какое‐нибудь странное место, и мы просто ещё не нашли его. Никто пока не сказал об этом вслух, но эта версия выглядела очень убедительно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se o culpado teve a precaução de mover os corpos do meu pai e os demais, que nós pensávamos que tinham sido assassinados na sala de jantar, por todo o caminho até o depósito, então talvez ele também tivesse matado o vovô, movido seu corpo para algum lugar estranho, e nós simplesmente não o havíamos encontrado... Ninguém realmente disse isso, mas essa teoria parecia extremamente convincente...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就如被認為是在餐廳遇害的老爸他們的遺體，被犯人故意地轉移到了倉庫一樣，也許爺爺也已經被殺害，他的遺體也被搬到了什麼奇怪的地方，只是現在還沒有被發現而已…。雖然誰都不說出口來，但這是非常有說服力的看法…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就如被认为是在餐厅遇害的老爸他们的遗体，被犯人故意地转移到了仓库一样，也许爷爷也已经被杀害，他的遗体也被搬到了什么奇怪的地方，只是现在还没有被发现而已…。虽然谁都不说出口来，但这是非常有说服力的看法…。
Italian (IT): La teoria per cui i cadaveri del mio vecchio e degli altri, che si presume siano stati ammazzati nella sala da pranzo, furono deliberatamente spostati nel magazzino, e per cui il nonno fosse già stato ucciso, col suo cadavere portato in qualche strana zona da noi non ancora scoperta... era estremamente convincente, anche se nessuno lo disse ad alta voce...
Turkish (TR): Eğer suçlu, yemek salonunda öldürüldüğünü düşündüğümüz babamın ve diğerlerinin cesetlerini ambara kadar taşıma zahmetine katlandıysa, belki de Büyükbabamı çoktan öldürmüşler, ve cesedini garip bir yere taşımışlardı ve biz onu henüz bulamamıştık... Aslında kimse bunu söylemedi ama bu teori son derece ikna edici görünüyordu...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): "We will go check that all of the windows and doors are closed. We must also carefully search for Father. Children, make sure you do not leave this room."
Steam (ST): "We will go check that all of the windows and doors are locked. We must also conduct a thorough search for Father. The children must remain in this room...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "We will go check that all of the windows and doors are closed. We must also carefully search for Father. So that the children stay in this room...
PC Japanese (JP): 「私たちは、お屋敷の戸締りを確認してきます。お父様も念入りに探さなければなりません。子どもたちはこの部屋を出ないように。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私たちは、お屋敷の戸締りを確認してきます。お父様も念入りに探さなければなりません。子どもたちはこの部屋を出ないように」
Russian (RU): "Мы сходим, проверим, везде ли закрыты окна и двери. Нам следует более тщательно искать отца. Дети, не покидайте этой комнаты ни при каких условиях."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nós vamos verificar se todas as janelas e portas estão fechadas. Devemos também cuidadosamente procurar pelo pai. Crianças, certifiquem‐se de não saírem da sala."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我們要去檢查一下大屋門窗的鎖。也必須去仔細找找爸去哪了。小孩們不要出這房間。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我们要去检查一下大屋门窗的锁。也必须去仔细找找爸去哪了。小孩们不要出这房间。」
Italian (IT): "Andremo a controllare che tutte le finestre e le porte siano chiuse. Dobbiamo cercare con molta attenzione anche nostro padre. I ragazzi rimarranno in questa stanza..."
Turkish (TR): "Gidip tüm pencere ve kapıların kapalı olup olmadığını kontrol edeceğiz. Babamı da dikkatlice aramalıyız. Çocuklar, bu odadan çıkmadığınızdan emin olun."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): "Eva‐san and Hideyoshi‐san, I'm sorry, but please stay here with the children. Doctor Nanjo as well."
Steam (ST): Eva-san and Hideyoshi-san, I'm sorry, but please stay here with the children. I'd like to ask you the same, Doctor Nanjo."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva-san and Hideyoshi-san, I'm sorry, but please stay here with the children. Doctor Nanjo as well."
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽さんと秀吉さんは、申し訳ありませんが、ここで子どもたちと一緒にいてください。南條先生もお願いいたします。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「絵羽さんと秀吉さんは、申し訳ありませんが、ここで子どもたちと一緒にいてください。南條先生もお願いいたします」
Russian (RU): "Ева‐сан и Хидэёши‐сан, мне жаль, но, пожалуйста, останьтесь здесь вместе с детьми. Доктор Нанджо тоже."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eva‐san e Hideyoshi‐san, eu sinto muito, mas, por favor, fiquem aqui com as crianças. Doutor Nanjo, você também."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「至於繪羽和秀吉，不好意思，請你們和小孩們待在一起。南條大夫拜託你也和他們一起。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「至于绘羽和秀吉，不好意思，请你们和小孩们待在一起。南条大夫拜托你也和他们一起。」
Italian (IT): "Eva-san, Hideyoshi-san, mi rincresce molto, ma vi prego, restate qui con i ragazzi. Chiedo lo stesso favore a lei, dottor Nanjo."
Turkish (TR): "Eva-san ve Hideyoshi-san, üzgünüm ama lütfen burada çocuklarla kalın. Doktor Nanjo sen de."

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Umineko Project (UP): "...I understand. I will wait here......"
Steam (ST): "...I understand. I will wait here......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「…わかりました。ここでお待ちしています……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…わかりました。ここでお待ちしています……」
Russian (RU): "...Я понимаю. Я буду ждать здесь......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Entendido. Eu vou esperar aqui......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…知道了。我們就在這裡等……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…知道了。我们就在这里等……」
Italian (IT): "...D'accordo. Aspetterò qui..."
Turkish (TR): "...Anladım. Burada bekleyeceğim......"

Umineko Project (UP): Aunt Natsuhi led the servants—Genji‐san, Kumasawa‐san, and Kanon‐kun—out of the parlor.
Steam (ST): Aunt Natsuhi followed the servants, Genji-san, Kumasawa-san, and Kanon-kun, out of the parlor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi oba-san followed the servants, Genji-san, Kumasawa-san, and Kanon-kun, out of the parlor.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃伯母さんは、使用人たち、源次さんと熊沢さんと嘉音くんを従え、客間を出て行った。
Russian (RU): Вслед за слугами: Генджи‐саном, Кумасавой‐сан и Каноном‐куном, тётя Нацухи вышла из гостиной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Natsuhi levou os serviçais — o Genji‐san, a Kumasawa‐san e o Kanon‐kun — para fora da sala de visitas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃伯母帶領著傭人源次、熊澤、嘉音，離開了客廳。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Umineko Project (UP): "Let's all stick together, and maybe watch some TV while we wait. Geez, Sunday daytime TV sure doesn't have many good shows on, huh?"

PC Japanese (JP): 「みんなで仲良く、テレビでも見て待ってよな。しっかし、日曜日の午前中はロクな番組やっとらへんなぁ。」

Steam (ST): "Battler-kun, let's leave him be."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Battler-kun. Leave him alone."
PC Japanese (JP): 「戦人くん。そっとしてあげなさい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「戦人くん。そっとしてあげなさい」
Russian (RU): "Баттлер‐кун. Оставь его в покое."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「战人君。让他静一会吧。」
Italian (IT): "Battler-kun. Lascialo stare."
Turkish (TR): "Battler-kun. Onu yalnız bırak."

Umineko Project (UP): After those words from Auntie Eva, I stopped talking to him.
Steam (ST): After Aunt Eva said that, I stopped talking to him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After Eva oba-san spoke to me, I stopped talking to him.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんに言われ、俺はそれ以上、言葉をかけるのをやめる。
Russian (RU): Послушавшись тётю Еву, я не стал ничего больше ему говорить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois dessas palavras da tia Eva, eu parei de falar com ele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被繪羽姑母一提醒，我便也不再往下說了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被绘羽姑母一提醒，我便也不再往下说了。
Italian (IT): Dopo che zia Eva mi disse ciò, smisi di rivolgergli la parola...
Turkish (TR): Eva Teyze'nin bu sözlerinden sonra onunla konuşmayı bıraktım.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Misplaced words of comfort might actually hurt him.{n}Jessica sat down next to Aniki, and quietly put an arm around him.
Steam (ST): ...Misplaced words of comfort might actually do more harm than good. Jessica sat down next to Aniki and put an arm around him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Misplaced words of comfort might actually hurt him. Jessica sat down next to Aniki, and put an arm around him.
PC Japanese (JP): …慰めの言葉は、間違えれば心を傷つける。朱志香が兄貴の隣に座り、静かに肩を抱いていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …慰めの言葉は、間違えれば心を傷つける。{n}朱志香が兄貴の隣に座り、静かに肩を抱いていた。
Russian (RU): ...Бессмысленные слова утешения могли лишь разбередить ему рану.{n}Джессика села рядом с Аники и приобняла его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Palavras de conforto mal colocadas podem, na realidade, machucá‐lo.{n}A Jessica sentou próxima ao aniki, e calmamente colocou um braço em volta dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …安慰的言詞，選錯了的話是會傷人心的。{n}朱志香坐到大哥身邊，靜靜地抱住了他的肩膀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …安慰的言词，选错了的话是会伤人心的。{n}朱志香坐到大哥身边，静静地抱住了他的肩膀。
Italian (IT): Se dette al momento sbagliato, delle frasi di conforto possono ferire i cuori delle persone. Jessica si sedette vicino al fratellone, e in silenzio, gli mise un braccio attorno alle spalle...
Turkish (TR): ...Yersiz teselli sözleri onu gerçekten incitebilirdi.{n}Jessica Aniki'nin yanına oturdu ve sessizce kolunu ona doladı.

Umineko Project (UP): .........Maybe only Jessica, who had known about Aniki and Shannon's love since the beginning, and who had been discussing that relationship with Shannon, ...could comfort Aniki now.
Steam (ST): Maybe only Jessica, who had known about Aniki and Shannon's love since the beginning, and who had even discussed that relationship with Shannon, ...could comfort Aniki now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe only Jessica, who had known about Aniki and Shannon's love since the beginning, and who had discussed that relationship with Shannon, ...could comfort Aniki now.
PC Japanese (JP): ………兄貴と紗音の馴れ初めからを知り、紗音から交際についての相談まで受けていたという朱志香にしか、…兄貴を慰めることはできないだろう。
Russian (RU): Вполне возможно, что только Джессика, знавшая о любви Аники и Шаннон с самого начала, и которой приходилось обсуждать эти отношения с Шаннон... могла сейчас успокоить Аники.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Talvez a Jessica fosse a única que tinha conhecimento sobre o amor do aniki e da Shannon desde o início, e aquela que tinha estado discutindo esse relacionamento com a Shannon, ...poderia confortar o aniki nesse momento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………也許，只有從一開始就知道大哥和紗音的關係，甚至能被紗音當作商量的對象，一起探討戀愛話題的朱志香，…才能去安慰大哥吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………也许，只有从一开始就知道大哥和纱音的关系，甚至能被纱音当作商量的对象，一起探讨恋爱话题的朱志香，…才能去安慰大哥吧。
Italian (IT): Forse Jessica, che era a conoscenza dell'amore sbocciato tra George e Shannon,{n}e a cui Shannon aveva persino chiesto consigli sulla loro relazione... era l'unica che poteva consolarlo.
Turkish (TR): .........Belki de sadece Aniki ve Shannon'un aşkını başından beri bilen, ve Shannon'la bu ilişkiyi tartışan Jessica, ...şimdi Aniki'yi teselli edebilirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): I went over to Auntie Eva and sat down on the opposite sofa...
Steam (ST): I went over to Aunt Eva and sat down in the opposite sofa...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I went over to Eva oba-san and sat down in the opposite sofa...
PC Japanese (JP): 俺は、絵羽伯母さんのところへ行き、向かいのソファーに腰を下ろした…。
Russian (RU): Я перешёл к тёте Еве и сел на диван напротив...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu fui até a tia Eva e sentei no sofá oposto...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我走到了繪羽姑母旁邊，坐在了對面的沙發上…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我走到了绘羽姑母旁边，坐在了对面的沙发上…。
Italian (IT): Andai verso zia Eva, la quale era seduta sul divano opposto...
Turkish (TR): Eva teyzenin yanına gittim ve karşı kanepeye oturdum...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "Battler‐kun, you really are strong... It looks like you've kept a good hold on yourself."
Steam (ST): "Battler-kun, you really are strong... It looks like you've kept a good hold on yourself."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Battler-kun, you really are strong... It looks like you've kept a good hold on yourself."
PC Japanese (JP): 「戦人くんは強いわね…。もうだいぶしっかりしているように見えるわよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「戦人くんは強いわね…。もうだいぶしっかりしているように見えるわよ」
Russian (RU): "Баттлер‐кун, ты действительно силён... Я вижу, что тебе удаётся себя сдержать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Battler‐kun, você é realmente forte... Parece que está se mantendo firme."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「戰人君真堅強啊…。看上去已經差不多振作起來了呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「战人君真坚强啊…。看上去已经差不多振作起来了呢。」

Turkish (TR): "Battler-kun, gerçekten çok güçlüsün... Görünüşe göre kendini iyi tutmuşsun."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "...Umm, well, look, the depth of the love becomes the depth of the wound, right? That old bastard, I couldn't care less about no matter how he snuffed it. ...I feel bad about Kyrie‐san, but...well, she wasn't actually my parent."
Steam (ST): "...Umm, well, look, the depth of the love becomes the depth of the wound, right? After all, it's not like how that old bastard died has anything to do with me. ...I feel bad about Kyrie-san, but...well, she wasn't actually my parent."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Umm, well, look, the depth of the love becomes the depth of the wound, right? After all, it's not like how that old bastard died has anything to do with me. ...I feel bad about Kyrie-san, but...well, she wasn't actually my parent."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…まぁその、ほら、愛の深さが傷の深さじゃないっすか。俺は別にあんなクソ親父、どう死のうが知ったことじゃないし。…霧江さんは気の毒ですが、…まぁ本当の親ってわけじゃないですしね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…まぁその、ほら、愛の深さが傷の深さじゃないっすか。俺は別にあんなクソ親父、どう死のうが知ったことじゃないし。…霧江さんは気の毒ですが、…まぁ本当の親ってわけじゃないですしね」
Russian (RU): "...М‐м, ну, чем сильнее любовь, тем глубже рана, не так ли? В конце концов, не то чтобы меня касается, как умер этот старикан. ...Мне больше жаль Кирие‐сан, но... она ведь фактически и не была моим родителем."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Hmm, bem, veja, a profundidade do amor é a profundidade da ferida, não é mesmo? Aquele velho desgraçado, eu não poderia me importar menos, não importa como ele tenha sumido. ...Eu me sinto mal pela Kyrie‐san, mas...bem, ela não era realmente minha parente."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…這個嘛，對了，不是有句話叫愛之深傷之切嗎？對我來說那種混蛋老爸，他要怎麼死我才不管呢。…雖然這麼說對霧江姐挺過意不去，…不過她畢竟也不是我的親生母親啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…这个嘛，对了，不是有句话叫爱之深伤之切吗？对我来说那种混蛋老爸，他要怎么死我才不管呢。…虽然这么说对雾江姐挺过意不去，…不过她毕竟也不是我的亲生母亲啊。」
Italian (IT): "...Beh, ecco, dicono che la profondità dell'amore determini la profondità della ferita, giusto? Non è che mi importi molto di come sia morto quel vecchiaccio.{n}E mi spiace per Kirie-san, ma... sai, lei non era davvero un mio genitore."
Turkish (TR): "...Umm, pekala, sevginin derinliği yaranın derinliğine dönüşür, değil mi? O yaşlı piçin nasıl öldürüldüğü umurumda bile değil. ...Kyrie-san için üzülüyorum, ama...aslında o benim ebeveynim bile değildi."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "My, my. But on the other hand, you were crying a lot back then, right?"
Steam (ST): "My, my. If that's so, you certainly were crying a lot back then."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「あらぁ。というわりにはさっき、すっごく大泣きしてたわよぅ？」
Russian (RU): "Вот оно как. Но ведь, с другой стороны, ты тогда горько плакал, верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ora. Mas, por outro lado, você estava chorando muito naquela hora, não?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哎呀。说是这么说，但刚才你可是哭得好厉害哦？」
Italian (IT): "Oh, cielo. Ma d'altro canto, prima avevi pianto a dirotto."
Turkish (TR): "Vay. Ama bir yandan da o sırada çok ağlıyordun, değil mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, I did think that at least that much crying was due as gratitude to the parent who raised me... Hehehe..."
Steam (ST): "Well, I did think at least that much crying was due as gratitude to the parent who raised me... Heheheh..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「まぁ、育ての親に対する恩は、あのくらい泣けばＯＫかと思いまして…。へへへ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まぁ、育ての親に対する恩は、あのくらい泣けばＯＫかと思いまして…。へへへ…」
Russian (RU): "Ну, я думаю, что, по крайней мере, такой сильный плач был своего рода благодарностью родителям, вырастившим меня... Хе‐хе‐хе..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bom, eu acho que aquele choro foi pelos menos um ato de gratidão aos pais que me criaram... Hehehe..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我是覺得為了不負父母的養育之恩，起碼要那麼哭過才算 OK…。嘿嘿嘿…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我是觉得为了不负父母的养育之恩，起码要那么哭过才算 OK…。嘿嘿嘿…」
Italian (IT): "Beh, pensavo che fosse giusto piangere in segno di gratitudine verso il mio genitore acquisito... Eheheh..."
Turkish (TR): "Şey, en azından bu kadar ağlamanın beni yetiştiren ebeveynlerime bir minnet borcu olduğunu düşünmüştüm... Hehehe..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): ".........The way you can switch your mood quickly like that, and your dry tone, must have come from Rudolf. ...That kid would always get violently happy, sad, and angry, but he would always regain his cool immediately afterwards."
Steam (ST): ".........The speed of that changeover and that dry tone must've come from Rudolf. ...That kid would always get violently happy, sad, and angry, but he'd always regain his cool immediately afterwards."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........The speed of that changeover and that dry tone must have come from Rudolf. ...That kid would always get violently happy, sad, and angry, but he would always regain his cool immediately afterwards."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………その辺の切り替えの早さやドライな辺りは、本当に留弗夫譲りね。…あの子は昔から激しく喜んだり悲しんだり怒ったりしたけれど、すぐにケロリと平静を取り戻したわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………その辺の切り替えの早さやドライな辺りは、本当に留弗夫譲りね。…あの子は昔から激しく喜んだり悲しんだり怒ったりしたけれど、すぐにケロリと平静を取り戻したわ」
Russian (RU): ".........Скорость такой перемены настроения и сухой тон, должно быть, достались тебе от Рудольфа. ...Он всегда бурно радовался, грустил и сердился, но сразу же после этого всегда обретал хладнокровие."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........A maneira como você pode mudar seu ânimo rapidamente assim, e seu tom seco, devem ter vindo do Rudolf. ...Aquela criança sempre ficava violentamente feliz, triste e furiosa, mas depois de tudo ele imediatamente recuperava sua compostura."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………這情緒來去如風的薄涼之處，真是遺傳自留弗夫啊。…他這人從以前就老是會激烈地大喜、大悲或是大怒，但馬上又會若無其事地靜下來呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………这情绪来去如风的薄凉之处，真是遗传自留弗夫啊。…他这人从以前就老是会激烈地大喜、大悲或是大怒，但马上又会若无其事地静下来呢。」
Italian (IT): "...Devi aver preso da Rudolf il tuo sarcasmo e la tua volubilità... Quel ragazzo si alternava sempre tra la felicità impetuosa, la tristezza e la rabbia, ma subito dopo ritornava con la sua calma noncurante."
Turkish (TR): ".........Ruh halini bu kadar çabuk değiştirebilmen ve kuru ses tonun Rudolf'tan geliyor olmalı. ...O çocuk her zaman acayip bir şekilde mutlu, üzgün ve kızgın olurdu, ama hemen ardından soğukkanlılığını geri kazanırdı."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "......It's nothing like that. I haven't really been able to get over the shock yet either. ...I think it's just that the emotions that rose up in me were...different from everybody else's."
Steam (ST): "...It's nothing like that. I haven't really been able to get over the shock yet. ...I think the only difference between me and everyone else...is the kinds of emotions it's stirred in me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......It's nothing like that. I haven't really been able to get over the shock yet. ...I think it's just that the emotions that rose up in me were different from everybody else's."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そんなことはないっすよ。俺だって、まだまだ心のショックから立ち直れちゃいません。…ただ俺がみんなと違うのは、…それによってどういう感情が生み出されるかってことだと思います。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そんなことはないっすよ。俺だって、まだまだ心のショックから立ち直れちゃいません。…ただ俺がみんなと違うのは、…それによってどういう感情が生み出されるかってことだと思います」
Russian (RU): "......Ничего подобного. На самом деле я всё ещё не отошёл от того шока. ...Я просто думаю, что эмоции, бушующие во мне, отличаются от тех, что испытывают остальные."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Não é nada assim. Eu ainda não fui capaz de realmente superar o choque. ...Eu acho que é apenas que as emoções que surgiram em mim foram...diferentes das emoções das outras pessoas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……沒這回事。就算是我，也還遠遠沒有從這精神上的打擊中站起來。…只是，我覺得我和大家的區別，…是由此而生的感情有所不同。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……没这回事。就算是我，也还远远没有从这精神上的打击中站起来。…只是，我觉得我和大家的区别，…是由此而生的感情有所不同。」
Italian (IT): "...Non è così. Non ho ancora superato lo shock che ho subito... Semplicemente, penso che le emozioni che fremono in me siano diverse da quelle di tutti gli altri."
Turkish (TR): "......Öyle bir şey değil. Ben de henüz şoku atlatabilmiş değilim. ...Sanırım benim içimde yükselen duygular...herkesinkinden farklıydı."

Umineko Project (UP): I was acting much calmer than George‐aniki and Jessica were.
Steam (ST): I've been acting much calmer than George-aniki and Jessica.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I had been acting much calmer than George-aniki and Jessica had been.

Umineko Project (UP): ...That wasn't because my sadness was less intense and I'd already sprung back to normal.{n}It was because my sadness had been gradually replaced, by a different emotion.
Steam (ST): That wasn't because my sadness was any less intense, or because I'd already recovered. My sadness was simply getting replaced gradually with a different emotion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That wasn't because my sadness was any less intense, or because I had already sprung back to normal. It was just because my sadness was gradually replacing a different emotion.
PC Japanese (JP): …それは悲しみが浅くて、もう立ち直ったからではない。悲しみが、別の感情に徐々にすり替わっていったからだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …それは悲しみが浅くて、もう立ち直ったからではない。{n}悲しみが、別の感情に徐々にすり替わっていったからだ。
Russian (RU): Это было не потому, что моё горе было слабее, или потому, что мне уже удалось взять себя в руки.{n}Просто мою печаль постепенно вытеснило другое чувство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Tudo isso porque a minha tristeza foi menos intensa e eu já tinha voltado ao normal.{n}Foi porque a minha tristeza foi, gradualmente, substituída por uma emoção diferente.

Chinese Simplified (CN): …但这并不是因为悲伤之情不深，已经振作起来了。{n}而是因为，悲伤之情慢慢地转变成了另一种感情。
Italian (IT): Non perché il mio dolore fosse meno intenso, o perché mi fossi già ripreso.{n}Era perché la mia tristezza stava man mano venendo sostituita da un'emozione diversa.
Turkish (TR): ...Bunun nedeni üzüntümün daha az yoğun olması ve çoktan normale dönmüş olmam değildi.{n}Üzüntümün yerini yavaş yavaş farklı bir duygunun almasıydı.

Umineko Project (UP): "............Rather than sadness, .........it's more like I'm irritated. What bastard did this and where the hell is he? ...I feel like I can't settle down until I've smacked him upside the face."
Steam (ST): "......Rather than sad, ......I'd say I'm more pissed off. What bastard did this and where? ...It's kinda been eating at me that I didn't get a chance to smack him upside the face."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............Rather than sadness, .........it's more like I'm irritated. What bastard did this and where? ...It's kinda been eating at me that I didn't get a chance to smack him upside the face."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………悲しい、ってよりは、………腹立たしいって気持ちなんすよ。どこのどいつがこんなことをしやがったのか。…横っ面に一発お見舞いしてやらないことには腹の虫が治まらねぇんです。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………悲しい、ってよりは、………腹立たしいって気持ちなんすよ。どこのどいつがこんなことをしやがったのか。…横っ面に一発お見舞いしてやらないことには腹の虫が治まらねぇんです」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "Obviously, right? Who else could be here? No one is on this island except us. There are only 18 people. ...So the one who pretended to be {f:5:Beatrice} has to be one of those 18."

PC Japanese (JP): 「当然でしょ？　私たち以外の誰がここにいるって言うの？　この島には私たちしかいない。１８人しかいない。…なら、ベアトリーチェを騙るのも１８人の中の誰かしかいないじゃない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「当然でしょ？　私たち以外の誰がここにいるって言うの？　この島には私たちしかいない。１８人しかいない。…なら、ベアトリーチェを騙るのも１８人の中の誰かしかいないじゃない」
Russian (RU): "Это ведь очевидно, не так ли? Ты хочешь сказать, здесь есть ещё кто‐то кроме нас? На этом острове находимся лишь мы и больше никто. Здесь только 18 человек. Поэтому тот, кто притворяется {f:5:Беатриче}, должен быть одним из восемнадцати."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Obviamente, certo? Quem mais poderia estar aqui? Não há ninguém nesta ilha, exceto nós. Há apenas 18 pessoas. ...Então, aquele que fingiu ser a {f:5:Beatrice} está entre os 18."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「可不嘛？难道你要说除我们之外还有别人在这里吗？这座岛上除我们以外别无他人。只有十八人。…既然如此，那伪装成贝阿朵莉切的也只能是这十八人中的某人啊。」

PC Japanese (JP): 「犯人は倉庫の中に６人の遺体を運び込んだわ。でも、よく倉庫の中に運び込めたわよね？　あのシャッターは常に閉められていて、施錠されていたそうよ？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「犯人は倉庫の中に６人の遺体を運び込んだわ。でも、よく倉庫の中に運び込めたわよね？　あのシャッターは常に閉められていて、施錠されていたそうよ？」
Russian (RU): "Преступник отнёс тела тех шестерых в кладовую. Но вот у них неплохо получилось проникнуть внутрь неё, не находишь? Ведь та подъёмная дверь всегда опущена и на замке, верно я говорю?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O culpado carregou os corpos de seis pessoas para o depósito. Mas ele fez um bom trabalho para entrar no depósito, não é mesmo? Aquele {i:shutter} era sempre mantido fechado e trancado, pelo que me disseram."

Turkish (TR): "Yemek salonunda dört kişiye saldırıp hepsini birden öldürebilmeleri, toplam altı cesedi de gül bahçesinin ötesindeki ambara kadar sürüklemeleri ve yüzlerine o iğrenç makyajı yapmaları gerekiyordu. ......Bütün bunları tek bir suçlunun tek başına yapmasına imkân yok, değil mi?"

Umineko Project (UP): It was impossible. It might not have been if a single person spent enough time on it, but that would have taken ages.
Steam (ST): It made sense. It probably would've been possible for a single person with enough time, but it would take so incredibly long.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was impossible. It might not have been if a single person had enough time, but that would have taken ages.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era impossível. Teria levado um tempo absurdo para uma única pessoa executar tudo isso sozinha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 有道理。雖然只要有時間，一個人也不是不可能辦到，但那實在太費事了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 有道理。虽然只要有时间，一个人也不是不可能办到，但那实在太费事了。
Italian (IT): Aveva senso. Probabilmente una persona sola, se avesse avuto abbastanza tempo a disposizione, ci sarebbe riuscita, ma ci avrebbe messo tantissimo.
Turkish (TR): Bu imkansızdı. Tek bir kişi yeterince zaman harcasaydı mümkün olabilirdi ama bu da yıllar alırdı.

Ситуация ничем не отличается от той, что была вчера вечером. ......Проще говоря, преступнику ничего не стоит расправиться с остальными из нас."

Le condizioni non sono diverse da quelle della notte scorsa...{n}In breve, per i colpevoli sarebbe semplice massacrare il resto di noi."

Umineko Project (UP): I had been playing detective with Auntie Eva out of a desire to expose the person who had killed Dad and the rest before the police did.
Steam (ST): I'd been playing detective with Aunt Eva, trying to expose the person who had killed Dad and the rest before the police did.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I had been playing detective with Eva oba-san, trying to expose the person who had killed Dad and the rest before the police did.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺は、親父たちを殺した犯人を、警察よりも早く暴きたいと思い、こうして絵羽伯母さんと推理ごっこをしていた。
Russian (RU): Вместе с тётей Евой я играл в детектива, пытаясь разоблачить человека, убившего папу и остальных, до того, как это сделает полиция.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estava brincando de detetive com a tia Eva, por um desejo de descobrir a pessoa que matou meu pai antes que a polícia descobrisse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我是想先於警察一步找出殺死老爸他們的犯人，所以才在陪著繪羽姑母玩推理。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我是想先于警察一步找出杀死老爸他们的犯人，所以才在陪着绘羽姑母玩推理。

Turkish (TR): Babamı ve diğerlerini öldüren kişiyi polisten önce ortaya çıkarma arzusuyla Eva Teyze ile dedektifçilik oynuyordum.

Umineko Project (UP): ...If I could manage to skillfully penetrate the culprit's identity, I wanted to stick the evidence in their face.
Steam (ST): ...If only I could cleverly penetrate the culprit's identity and stick the proof in their face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...If only I could skillfully penetrate the culprit's identity, I wanted to stick proof that it was them in their face.
PC Japanese (JP): …もし見事犯人を看破できたなら、その証拠を突きつけたかった。
Russian (RU): ...Если бы я только мог искусно вычислить личность преступника, я бросил бы ему доказательство того, что он — это он, прямо в лицо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Se eu conseguisse entrar habilmente na identidade do culpado, eu gostaria de enfiar a evidência na sua cara.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …我還深信著，如果我能完美看穿誰是犯人的話，就去找出證據亮在他眼前。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …我还深信着，如果我能完美看穿谁是犯人的话，就去找出证据亮在他眼前。
Italian (IT): Se fossi riuscito a scoprire con successo i criminali, avrei tanto voluto sbatterli in faccia le prove della loro colpevolezza...
Turkish (TR): ...Eğer suçlunun kimliğine ustalıkla ulaşmayı başarabilirsem, kanıtları yüzlerine vurmak istiyordum.

Umineko Project (UP): ......I had gotten it into my head that if I did that, the culprit would give up and surrender, just like in one of those detective movies.
Steam (ST): ......I'd been so sure that, just like in one of those detective movies, the culprit would then give up and surrender.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I had been so sure that, just like in one of those detective movies, the culprit would then give up and surrender.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そうすれば、よくある探偵映画みたいに、犯人は観念して降参すると思い込んできた。
Russian (RU): ......Я пребывал в уверенности, что, совсем как в тех кино‐детективах, преступник оставит дальнейшие попытки отвертеться и сдастся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu tinha colocado na minha cabeça que se eu fizesse isso, o culpado poderia desistir e se render, como nos filmes de detetives.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如此一來，就會像那些常見的偵探電影一樣，犯人放棄抵抗乖乖投降。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如此一来，就会像那些常见的侦探电影一样，犯人放弃抵抗乖乖投降。
Italian (IT): Ero convinto che i colpevoli, proprio come in uno di quei film gialli, si sarebbero arresi e rassegnati.
Turkish (TR): ......Bunu yaparsam, tıpkı dedektif filmlerinde olduğu gibi, suçlunun pes edip teslim olacağını düşünmüştüm.

Umineko Project (UP): However, the culprit only surrenders there because they are in a situation where resisting would be futile.
Steam (ST): However, the culprit would only surrender if there was no way for them to fight back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, the culprit would only surrender if there was no way for them to fight back.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、犯人が降参するのは、抗っても無駄だからという前提があるからだ。
Russian (RU): Однако на деле преступник сдаётся только после того, когда он уже не в силах бороться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, o culpado só se rende nos filmes porque ele está em uma situação onde a resistência seria inútil.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，犯人會投降是因為有個前提，那就是他們怎麼抵抗都沒用。

Turkish (TR): Ancak, suçlu sadece direnmenin faydasız olacağı bir durumda kaldığı zaman teslim olur.

Umineko Project (UP): The culprits behind these incidents on the island were far from helpless, and might even be able to massacre all of the remaining people on the island.
Steam (ST): The culprits behind the crime on this island were far from helpless... and might even be able to massacre all of the remaining people here.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The culprits behind these cases on the island were far from helpless, and might even be able to massacre all of the remaining people on the island.
PC Japanese (JP): 今この島で起こっている事件の犯人たちは、無力どころか、島に残った人間全員を皆殺しにすることすら可能かもしれない。
Russian (RU): Тех, кто совершил преступление на этом острове, вряд ли можно было назвать беспомощными, вполне вероятно, что им по силам расправиться и с оставшимися людьми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os culpados pelo que ocorreu nesta ilha estavam longe de serem indefesos, e poderiam também até mesmo serem capazes de massacrar todas as pessoas restantes nesta ilha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 現在在這島上犯下這起事件的犯人們，別說無力了，說不定都有可能把島上剩下的人全部殺光。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 现在在这岛上犯下这起事件的犯人们，别说无力了，说不定都有可能把岛上剩下的人全部杀光。
Italian (IT): Ma su quest'isola, i colpevoli dietro a questo crimine erano tutt'altro che impotenti... e potevano essere in grado di trucidare tutte le persone rimaste.

Umineko Project (UP): ...And on top of that, this island was like a giant locked room, cut off from the outside world by the typhoon, so they had the full day until tomorrow to kill, scheme, and cover up their handiwork......
Steam (ST): ...And on top of that, this island was like a giant closed room, cut off from the outside world by the typhoon, so they had a full day, until tomorrow, to kill, scheme and camouflage themselves...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...And on top of that, this island was like a giant locked room, cut off from the outside world by the typhoon, so they had a full day, until tomorrow, to kill, scheme and camouflage themselves......
PC Japanese (JP): …しかもこの島は台風によって切り取られた巨大な密室で、殺す時間も、そして何かの工作や偽装をする時間も、明日までたっぷり丸一日ある……。
Russian (RU): ...Более того, остров сейчас напоминал огромную запертую комнату, отрезанную ураганом от окружающего мира, так что у них на руках ещё целый день до завтра, чтобы убить, что‐нибудь замыслить и спрятаться......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E, coroando tudo isso, esta ilha era um gigantesco quarto fechado, isolado do mundo exterior pelo tufão, por isso eles tinham todo o dia até amanhã para esquematizar e cobrir seu trabalho manual......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …而且現在這座島，是個被台風與外界切斷了聯繫的巨大密室，殺人也好，接著做些什麼偽裝也罷，到明天為止都有足足一整天的時間……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …而且现在这座岛，是个被台风与外界切断了联系的巨大密室，杀人也好，接着做些什么伪装也罢，到明天为止都有足足一整天的时间……。
Italian (IT): ...E come se non bastasse, quest'isola era come una gigantesca camera chiusa, che il tifone aveva tagliato fuori dal mondo, e fino a domani avevano un giorno intero per ucciderci, così come per coordinarsi e coprire le loro tracce...
Turkish (TR): ...Üstelik şu an bu ada, tayfun yüzünden dış dünyayla bağlantısı kesilmiş dev bir kilitli oda gibiydi, yani yarına kadar öldürmek, entrika çevirmek ve yaptıklarını örtbas etmek için tam bir günleri vardı......

Umineko Project (UP): In short, we weren't in the kind of safe atmosphere where we could entertain ourselves by playing detective...
Steam (ST): In short, it wasn't a safe atmosphere where we could get very far by playing detective...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In short, it wasn't a safe atmosphere where we could get very far by playing detective...

Umineko Project (UP): On the contrary, we were at a stage where we had to be scared stiff, since playing detective might displease the culprits, and cause them to repeat another mass murder......

Original Witch Hunt (OG): To the contrary, we were at a stage where we had to be scared stiff, since playing detective might displease the culprits, and cause them to repeat another mass murder......
PC Japanese (JP): それどころか、犯人たちが機嫌を損ね、再び大量殺人を繰り返すかもしれない恐怖に怯えていなければならない段階なのだ…。
